<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Divine Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6095) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=579" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 153 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
bloodline that grants divine spells

</column>

---

The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest rank, which you can use only to cast your choice of [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554) or [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1552). You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if they aren't in your spell repertoire.

<title level="2">Divine Evolution leads to...</title>
[Greater Spiritual Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6113), [Greater Vital Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6120)
name: Divine Evolution
